segment.source: How to Localize a MED-V Image
segment.target: How to Localize a MED-V Image

segment.source: How to Localize a MED-V Image
segment.target: How to Localize a MED-V Image

segment.source: How to Localize a MED-V Image
segment.target: How to Localize a MED-V Image

segment.source: A MED-V image can be localized, either by unpacking a packed image or by downloading an image from the server.
segment.target: A MED-V image can be localized, either by unpacking a packed image or by downloading an image from the server.

segment.source: All local images appear in the local repository.
segment.target: All local images appear in the local repository.

segment.source: How to Extract a MED-V Image for Use by the Local Client
segment.target: How to Extract a MED-V Image for Use by the Local Client

segment.source: A packed image can be unpacked to the local repository by extracting it.
segment.target: A packed image can be unpacked to the local repository by extracting it.

segment.source: It then does not need to be downloaded from the server.
segment.target: It then does not need to be downloaded from the server.

segment.source: To extract a MED-V image
segment.target: To extract a MED-V image

segment.source: In the Local Packed Images pane, select an image.
segment.target: In the Local Packed Images pane, select an image.

segment.source: Right-click, and from the drop-down menu, select Extract image.
segment.target: Right-click, and from the drop-down menu, select Extract image.

segment.source: The image is extracted to the local drive and can now be used by the local client running on the computer.
segment.target: The image is extracted to the local drive and can now be used by the local client running on the computer.

segment.source: How to Download a MED-V Image to the Local Repository
segment.target: How to Download a MED-V Image to the Local Repository

segment.source: To download a MED-V image
segment.target: To download a MED-V image

segment.source: In the Packed Images on Server pane, select the image or version of the image to download.
segment.target: In the Packed Images on Server pane, select the image or version of the image to download.

segment.source: Click Download.
segment.target: Click Download.

segment.source: The image is downloaded to your local computer.
segment.target: The image is downloaded to your local computer.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: The downloaded image will not appear in the Local Images pane until you refresh the page.
segment.target: The downloaded image will not appear in the Local Images pane until you refresh the page.

segment.source: Click Refresh to see the downloaded image in the Local Images pane.
segment.target: Click Refresh to see the downloaded image in the Local Images pane.
